gw.pl.currency

Class MonetaryAmount

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.pl.currency.MonetaryAmount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMoney, IDimension<S,T>, ISequenceable<E,S,U>, GWRemotable, java.lang.Comparable<T>

    public class MonetaryAmount
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMoney, GWRemotable, IDimension<S,T>, java.lang.Comparable<T>, ISequenceable<E,S,U>
    Represents a monetary amount with a currency.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.math.BigDecimal Amount
      The BigDecimal amount of the MonetaryAmount. This property will not return null.
      Currency Currency
      The Currency typekey of this MonetaryAmount.

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MonetaryAmount(java.lang.String value)
      Construct using a string formatted as " " such as "23.25 USD"
      MonetaryAmount(java.math.BigDecimal amount, Currency currency)
      Primary constructor
      MonetaryAmount()
      Required for SOAP. A MonetaryAmount constructed with this constructor is not valid until both {@link #setAmount(java.math.BigDecimal)} and {@link #setCurrency(Currency)} have been called on it. Normal callers should use {@link #MonetaryAmount(java.math.BigDecimal, Currency)} instead.

      MonetaryAmount add(MonetaryAmount amount)
      Add amount.getAmount() to this.getAmount()
      int compareTo(MonetaryAmount o)
      Compares this currency amount with another by comparing their numeric amounts. If both currency amounts specify a currency, then the currencies must be the same.

      See {@link java.lang.Comparable#compareTo} for an explanation of the int return value.
      java.math.BigDecimal divide(MonetaryAmount amount, java.math.MathContext mc)
      Divides this by the given MonetaryAmount, using the give MatchContext

      CurrencyAmount toCurrencyAmount()
      Converts this IMoney into a CurrencyAmount. Returns null if this IMoney's Amount is null. Otherwise, returns a CurrencyAmount whose amount and currency are equal to this IMoney's.
      java.math.BigDecimal toNumber()
      Implementation of {@link gw.lang.IDimension}
      java.lang.String toString()
      Converts tha currency amount to the form <amount>[<SPACE><currency>]. Note this routine does not apply localized formatting.

      • MonetaryAmount

        MonetaryAmount()
        Required for SOAP. A MonetaryAmount constructed with this constructor is not valid until both {@link #setAmount(java.math.BigDecimal)} and {@link #setCurrency(Currency)} have been called on it. Normal callers should use {@link #MonetaryAmount(java.math.BigDecimal, Currency)} instead.

      • toCurrencyAmount

        CurrencyAmount toCurrencyAmount()
        Converts this IMoney into a CurrencyAmount. Returns null if this IMoney's Amount is null. Otherwise, returns a CurrencyAmount whose amount and currency are equal to this IMoney's.

        MonetaryAmount add(MonetaryAmount amount,
                 java.math.MathContext mc)
        Add amount to this
        Parameters:
        amount -
        mc -
        Returns:
        A MonetaryAmount where getAmount() == this.getAmount().add(amount.getAmount(), mc) and getCurrency() == this.getCurrency()

      • divide

        java.math.BigDecimal divide(MonetaryAmount amount)
        Divide this by the given MonetaryAmount, which must have the same Currency as this.
        Parameters:
        amount -
        Returns:
        A BigDecimal that has a value this.getAmount().divide(amount, MathContext.DECIMAL128)

      • signum

        int signum()
        Returns the sign of this MonetaryAmount.
        Returns:
